attributes.action: We have freedom of speech and expression in the UK.
attributes.background:
Successive governments have limited freedom of speech and expression.The right to offend has been a right in the UK for over 200 years.
We must restore the right of all individuals to say what they like,

I may not agree with what you say,
But I will defend to the end your right to say it.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking Parliament for a specific change to the law, to achieve the outcome you want.
